verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man דַּבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> to the children עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> upon אֶ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon a land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If אָבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> unto them When I bring עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword וְלָקְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> take עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> if the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> a מִקְצֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7097><s%> of their coasts וְנָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> and set אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> לָהֶ֖ם לְצֹפֶֽה׃ <S%H6822><s%> him for their watchman

וְרָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> If when he seeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword בָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land וְתָקַ֥ע <S%H8628><s%> he blow בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> the trumpet וְהִזְהִ֥יר <S%H2094><s%> and warn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

וְשָׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> Then whosoever הַשֹּׁמֵ֜עַ <S%H8085><s%> heareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָר֙ <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not נִזְהָ֔ר <S%H2094><s%> and taketh not warning וַתָּ֥בוֹא <S%H935><s%> come חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> if the sword וַתִּקָּחֵ֑הוּ <S%H3947><s%> and take him away דָּמ֥וֹ <S%H1818><s%> his blood בְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> shall be upon his own head יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> ק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet שָׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> He heard וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not נִזְהָ֔ר <S%H2094><s%> and took not warning דָּמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> his blood בּ֣וֹ יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נִזְהָ֖ר <S%H2094><s%> shall be upon him But he that taketh warning נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul מִלֵּֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> shall deliver

וְ֠הַצֹּפֶה <S%H6822><s%> But if the watchman כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יִרְאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֜רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword בָּאָ֗ה <S%H935><s%> come וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and does not תָקַ֤ע <S%H8628><s%> and blow בַּשּׁוֹפָר֙ <S%H7782><s%> not the trumpet וְהָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not נִזְהָ֔ר <S%H2094><s%> be not warned וַתָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> come חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> if the sword וַתִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> and take מֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [any] person ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> in his iniquity נִלְקָ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> from among them he is taken away וְדָמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> but his blood מִיַּֽד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַצֹּפֶ֥ה <S%H6822><s%> at the watchman's אֶדְרֹֽשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> will I require ס

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> So thou O son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man צֹפֶ֥ה <S%H6822><s%> thee a watchman נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> I have set לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <S%H8085><s%> therefore thou shalt hear מִפִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> at my mouth דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> the word וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֥ <S%H2094><s%> and warn אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

בְּאָמְרִ֣י <S%H559><s%> When I say לָרָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> unto the wicked רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> O wicked מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> [man] thou shalt surely תָּמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> die וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not דִבַּ֔רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> if thou dost not speak לְהַזְהִ֥יר <S%H2094><s%> to warn רָשָׁ֖ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> from his way ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> that wicked בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> [man] shall die וְדָמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> but his blood מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> at thine hand אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> will I require

וְ֠אַתָּה <S%H859><s%> your part כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if הִזְהַ֨רְתָּ <S%H2094><s%> Nevertheless if thou warn רָשָׁ֤ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked מִדַּרְכּוֹ֙ <S%H1870><s%> of his way לָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> to turn מִמֶּ֔נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not שָׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> from it if he do not turn מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> from his way ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> he shall die וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> your part נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H5337><s%> but thou hast delivered ס

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Therefore O thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֱמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus אֲמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus ye speak לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely פְשָׁעֵ֥ינוּ <S%H6588><s%> If our transgressions וְחַטֹּאתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H2403><s%> and our sins עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and וּבָ֛ם אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we נְמַקִּ֖ים <S%H4743><s%> [be] upon us and we pine away וְאֵ֥יךְ <S%H349><s%> how נִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> in them how should we then live

אֱמֹ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> unto חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> unto them [As] I live אָ֣נִי ׀ <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> no אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <S%H2654><s%> I have no pleasure בְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> in the death הָרָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> no בְּשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> turn רָשָׁ֛ע <S%H7563><s%> but that the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> from his way וְחָיָ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> and live שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> turn שׁ֜וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ye turn מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֧ם <S%H1870><s%> ways הָרָעִ֛ים <S%H7451><s%> ye from your evil וְלָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תָמ֖וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> for why will ye die בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Therefore thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֱמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people צִדְקַ֣ת <S%H6666><s%> The righteousness הַצַּדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not תַצִּילֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H5337><s%> shall not deliver בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> him in the day פִּשְׁע֔וֹ <S%H6588><s%> of his transgression וְרִשְׁעַ֤ת <S%H7564><s%> as for the wickedness הָֽרָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> he will not יִכָּ֣שֶׁל <S%H3782><s%> he shall not fall בָּ֔הּ בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thereby in the day שׁוּב֣וֹ <S%H7725><s%> that he turneth מֵֽרִשְׁע֑וֹ <S%H7562><s%> from his wickedness וְצַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> neither shall the righteous לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֛ל <S%H3201><s%> be able לִֽחְי֥וֹת <S%H2421><s%> to live בָּ֖הּ בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for his [righteousness] in the day חֲטֹאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2398><s%> that he sinneth

בְּאָמְרִ֤י <S%H559><s%> When I shall say לַצַּדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> to the righteous חָיֹ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> [that] he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> live וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he בָטַ֥ח <S%H982><s%> if he trust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in צִדְקָת֖וֹ <S%H6666><s%> to his own righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and commit עָ֑וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner [צִדְקָתֹו כ] (צִדְקֹתָיו֙ <S%H6666><s%> his righteousness ק) לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִזָּכַ֔רְנָה <S%H2142><s%> shall not be remembered וּבְעַוְל֥וֹ <S%H5766><s%> but for his iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of his which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that he hath committed בּ֥וֹ יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> he shall die

וּבְאָמְרִ֥י <S%H559><s%> Again when I say לָֽרָשָׁ֖ע <S%H7563><s%> unto the wicked מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Thou shalt surely תָּמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> die וְשָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> if he turn מֵֽחַטָּאת֔וֹ <S%H2403><s%> from his sin וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> and right

חֲבֹ֨ל <S%H2258><s%> the pledge יָשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> restore רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> [If] the wicked גְּזֵלָ֣ה <S%H1500><s%> that he had robbed יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <S%H7999><s%> give again בְּחֻקּ֤וֹת <S%H2708><s%> in the statutes הַֽחַיִּים֙ <S%H2416><s%> of life הָלַ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> without עֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> without committing עָ֑וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity חָי֥וֹ <S%H2421><s%> he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> live לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> he shall not die

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner [חַטָּאתֹו כ] (חַטֹּאתָיו֙ <S%H2403><s%> sin ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he חָטָ֔א <S%H2398><s%> that he hath committed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִזָּכַ֖רְנָה <S%H2142><s%> shall be mentioned ל֑וֹ מִשְׁפָּ֧ט <S%H4941><s%> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֛ה <S%H6666><s%> and right עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> unto him he hath done חָי֥וֹ <S%H2421><s%> he shall surely יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> live

וְאָמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> say בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Yet the children עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <S%H8505><s%> is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like דַּרְכָּ֥ם <S%H1870><s%> but as for them their way לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יִתָּכֵֽן׃ <S%H8505><s%> is not equal

בְּשׁוּב־ <S%H7725><s%> turneth צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> When the righteous מִצִּדְקָת֖וֹ <S%H6666><s%> from his righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> and committeth עָ֑וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity וּמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> he shall even die בָּהֶֽם׃

וּבְשׁ֤וּב <S%H7725><s%> turn רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> But if the wicked מֵֽרִשְׁעָת֔וֹ <S%H7564><s%> from his wickedness וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> and right עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> he shall live

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> Yet ye say לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <S%H8505><s%> is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord אִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> you every one כִּדְרָכָ֛יו <S%H1870><s%> after his ways אֶשְׁפּ֥וֹט <S%H8199><s%> I will judge אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become בִּשְׁתֵּ֧י <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> year בָּעֲשִׂרִ֛י <S%H6224><s%> in the tenth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month לְגָלוּתֵ֑נוּ <S%H1546><s%> of our captivity בָּא־ <S%H935><s%> came אֵלַ֨י <S%H413><s%> about הַפָּלִ֧יט <S%H6412><s%> [that] one that had escaped מִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> out of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto me saying הֻכְּתָ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> is smitten הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> The city

וְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> Now the hand יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> had been אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> upon בָּעֶ֗רֶב <S%H6153><s%> was upon me in the evening לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> afore בּ֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> came הַפָּלִ֔יט <S%H6412><s%> he that was escaped וַיִּפְתַּ֣ח <S%H6605><s%> and had opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֔י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> the time בּ֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> until he came אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> to me in the morning וַיִּפָּ֣תַח <S%H6605><s%> was opened פִּ֔י <S%H6310><s%> and my mouth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> was no נֶאֱלַ֖מְתִּי <S%H481><s%> and I was no more dumb עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> longer פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֱמֹ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Wherefore say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הַדָּ֧ם ׀ <S%H1818><s%> with the blood תֹּאכֵ֛לוּ <S%H398><s%> Ye eat וְעֵינֵכֶ֛ם <S%H5869><s%> your eyes תִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> and lift up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גִּלּוּלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> toward your idols וְדָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood תִּשְׁפֹּ֑כוּ <S%H8210><s%> and shed וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> then תִּירָֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> and shall ye possess

עֲמַדְתֶּ֤ם <S%H5975><s%> Ye stand עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on חַרְבְּכֶם֙ <S%H2719><s%> upon your sword עֲשִׂיתֶ֣ן <S%H6213><s%> ye work תּוֹעֵבָ֔ה <S%H8441><s%> abomination וְאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour's טִמֵּאתֶ֑ם <S%H2930><s%> and ye defile וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> then תִּירָֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> and shall ye possess ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> thou thus unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֮ <S%H3069><s%> GOD חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [As] I live אָנִי֒ <S%H589><s%> I אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֞א <S%H3808><s%> not אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who בֶּֽחֳרָבוֹת֙ <S%H2723><s%> surely they that [are] in the wastes בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפֹּ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> and whoever עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is in פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> and him that [is] in the open הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> field לַחַיָּ֥ה <S%H2416><s%> to the beasts נְתַתִּ֖יו <S%H5414><s%> will I give לְאָכְל֑וֹ <S%H398><s%> to be devoured וַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּמְּצָד֥וֹת <S%H4686><s%> castle וּבַמְּעָר֖וֹת <S%H4631><s%> and in the caves בַּדֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> of the pestilence יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall die

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> For I will lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the land שְׁמָמָ֣ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate וּמְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H4923><s%> most וְנִשְׁבַּ֖ת <S%H7673><s%> shall cease גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> and the pomp עֻזָּ֑הּ <S%H5797><s%> of her strength וְשָֽׁמְמ֛וּ <S%H8074><s%> shall be desolate הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> and the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no עוֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> that none shall pass through

וְיָב֣וֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> And they come אֵ֠לֶיךָ <S%H413><s%> about כִּמְבוֹא־ <S%H3996><s%> cometh עָ֞ם <S%H5971><s%> unto thee as the people וְיֵשְׁב֤וּ <S%H3427><s%> and they sit לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> before עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> thee [as] my people וְשָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> and they hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H1697><s%> thy words וְאוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יַֽעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> but they will not do כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֲגָבִ֤ים <S%H5690><s%> much love בְּפִיהֶם֙ <S%H6310><s%> them for with their mouth הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִׂ֔ים <S%H6213><s%> they shew אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after בִצְעָ֖ם <S%H1215><s%> their covetousness לִבָּ֥ם <S%H3820><s%> [but] their heart הֹלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> goeth
